text: Adriano Galliani (born 30 July 1944) is an Italian entrepreneur and football executive. He served as Deputy vice-chairman and CEO of AC Milan since 1986. During his tenure, Milan have won five European Cup / UEFA Champions League and eight Serie A titles among other achievements. In 2011, Galliani was inducted into the Italian Football Hall of Fame. ==References== ==Other websites== * Interview at lamescolanza.com * Profile at magliarossonera.it Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy Category:Sportspeople from Monza
title: Adriano Galliani
